医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现接受手术或放射性碘治疗的甲状腺功能亢进患者心血管风险较低当甲状腺产生的甲状腺激素超过身体所需时，就会发生甲状腺功能亢进症或甲状腺过度活跃。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Study-finds-lower-cardioangio-risks-in-hypertropic-患者-treatment-with-surgery-or-radioactive-iodine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Study-finds-lower-cardioangio-risks-in-hypertropic-患者-treatment-with-surgery-or-radioactive-iodine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a11664f5-9552-4df4-beed-e89b73aa9cf2 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:55:27 -0500 Study finds lower cardiovascular risks in hyperthyroid patients treated with surgery or radioactive iodine
RMIT 领导的研究强调澳大利亚迫切需要更多的药物检测设施对网上购买的非法药物进行检测后发现，35% 的药物与声称的不符，这突显出澳大利亚迫切需要建立更多的本地药物检测设施，以防止伤害和用药过量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/RMIT-led-study-highlights-the-urgent-need-for-more-drug-testing-facilities-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/RMIT-led-study-highlights-the-urgent-need-for-more-drug-testing-facilities-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb916469-1236-4c14-85b3-1ac474f70b60 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:43:29 -0500 RMIT-led study highlights the urgent need for more drug testing facilities in Australia
欧洲倡议旨在增进对 RNA 通讯的理解​由于 COVID-19 RNA 疫苗的出现，RNA（核糖核酸）已成为社会的主流词 - 但这种生物分子对社会的价值可能会扩展到食品安全和个性化医疗等众多领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/European-initiative-aims-to-advance-the-understanding-of-RNA-communication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/European-initiative-aims-to-advance-the-understanding-of-RNA-communication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=201bd876-da11-40cc-a07e-81b91e472b19 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:12:00 -0500 European initiative aims to advance the understanding of RNA communication
范围界定审查确定了阻碍乳腺癌筛查的主要健康社会决定因素迫切需要探索和了解哪些健康社会决定因素 (SDOH) 和健康不平等是导致美国乳腺癌筛查行为较低的重要影响因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Scoping-review-identizes-major-social-determinants-of-health-that-hinder-breast-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Scoping-review-identizes-major-social-determinants-of-health-that-hinder-breast-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce0ecec4-ba5f-4eb6-bc28-3b71c9aa3414 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 11:58:40 -0500 Scoping review identifies major social determinants of health that hinder breast cancer screening
应对控释药物配方的复杂性本次采访旨在解决控释药物制剂开发和制造中涉及的挑战和复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Navigating-the-complexities-of-driven-release-drug-formulations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Navigating-the-complexities-of-driven-release-drug-formulations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b34a4a14-29c5-4307-86c7-da1b13e3c1a5 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 11:32:00 -0500 Navigating the complexities of controlled release drug formulations
越南主动脉瓣狭窄患者 TAVR 结局的年龄比较宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。越来越多患有严重主动脉瓣狭窄的老年患者接受经导管主动脉瓣置换术（TAVR），与年轻人相比，引起了人们对其临床结果的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Age-based-comparison-of-TAVR-outcomes-in-Vietnamese-病人-with-aortic-stenosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Age-based-comparison-of-TAVR-outcomes-in-Vietnamese-病人-with-aortic-stenosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae787e3d-305e-4b5d-92b0-4c16c2353c1e Tue, 05 Mar 2024 11:05:47 -0500
再保险计划可能会增加 ACA 市场参与者的成本匹兹堡大学公立学院卫生政策研究人员的一项研究表明，再保险计划旨在帮助降低保费并增加《平价医疗法案》健康保险市场的注册人数，但可能对许多潜在的市场参与者产生相反的影响健康、杜克大学和明尼苏达大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Reinsurance-programs-may-increase-costs-for-ACA-marketplace-enrollees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Reinsurance-programs-may-increase-costs-for-ACA-marketplace-enrollees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6094dc1d-a357-468c-abe7-e40b0dcda576 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 10:56:46 -0500 Reinsurance programs may increase costs for ACA marketplace enrollees
Sacituzumab govitecan 联合铂类化疗对多种癌症有效2024 年 2 月 22 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“Sacituzumab govitecan 联合铂类化疗介导对三阴性乳腺癌、膀胱癌和小细胞肺癌的显着抗肿瘤作用”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Sacituzumab-govitecan-plus-platinum-based-chemotherapy- effective-in-multiple-carcinomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Sacituzumab-govitecan-plus-platinum-based-chemotherapy- effective-in-multiple-carcinomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d628143-b40d-4ba3-bb17-0dd603547727 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 10:46:44 -0500 Sacituzumab govitecan plus platinum-based chemotherapy effective in multiple carcinomas
产妇肥胖和肥胖合并其他危险因素与死产风险增加相关CMAJ 最近的一项研究比较了两个类别的肥胖母亲的死产风险。一个人仅将肥胖作为危险因素，而另一个人则有未确诊的或其他影响怀孕的高风险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Maternal-obesity-and-obesity-with-other-risk-factors-are-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-stillbirth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Maternal-obesity-and-obesity-with-other-risk-factors-are-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-stillbirth.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e39becf-e498-40dc-be36-cf1240a5b89c Tue, 05 Mar 2024 09:00:00 -0500 Maternal obesity and obesity with other risk factors are associated with an increased risk of stillbirth
国际委员会审查有关蓝光暴露对健康影响的相互矛盾的证据多年来，科学家们一直对过度暴露于短波长光（SWL）（包括智能手机、笔记本电脑和平板电脑的“蓝光”）潜在的不利健康影响表示担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/International-commission-examines-conflicting-evidence-on-health-effects-of-blue-light-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/International-commission-examines-conflicting-evidence-on-health-effects-of-blue-light-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ee36a06-aa3d-41ac-9ebb-5073600e2132 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:57:05 -0500 International commission examines conflicting evidence on health effects of blue light exposure
